name: Kidnap The Princess Because... I Don't Know
name_original: Kidnap The Princess Because... I Don't Know
description:
A lonely, failed, and immensely huge evil overlord decides to kidnap a princess to marry so that he won't need to be alone. After failing miserably, he teams up with a tiny fairy thief and sets out on the quest to kidnap a princess yet again! Will he fail miserably anyway or find someone to share his life with? That's up to you!

Follow a heartwarming story about friendship and loneliness over the course of several intricate platform levels! (4 levels, to be precise... you can do it!) Alternate between sneakyness and smashing the entire level to pieces in order to overcome all sorts of obstacles! Contains 2 playable characters with unique abilities!
